pages.text: Second boss in your journey.$(br)Recommended at least 2 players.$(br2)Stats:$(br)Health: 300$(br)Armor: 5$(br)Melee damage: 15$(br)Speed: 1.0$(br)Phases: 4
Phases:$(br)Melee attack.$(br)[<200 HP] Randomly ignites target.$(br)[<150 HP] Random teleportations to boss.$(br)[<100 HP] Player explosions (don't break blocks).
